newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ's TSB Bank introduces services to NZ Post Shops.
newsitem.headline: NZ's TSB Bank introduces services to NZ Post Shops.

text.p: New Zealand Post said on Tuesday it had struck a deal with TSB Bank to make TSB the first retail bank to provide services through the Post Shop network.
From June 3, TSB Bank customers will be able to make deposits into their bank accounts at Post Shops.
"The decision...is in response to strong growth in financial transactions at Post Shops and follows the recent introduction of Ergo deposit services," NZ Post said.
It said the initiative with TSB Bank would help to advance NZ Post's strategy for providing agency transaction services.
